test-set.name: xp-striding-grounded-consumingB
test-set.description: CP: Striding, RP: Grounded, RS: Consuming Self axis selecting other node-type on child, descendant(-or-self) etc axis is grounded (selects nothing) and remains consuming

test-case.name: xp-striding-grounded-consumingB001
test-case.description: CP: striding, RP: grounded, RS: consuming Base expression: foo Separators: / With axes: self With node types: any Invariant: node-type-unequal

modified.change: Added dependency for sweep and posture tests, added @part attribute for subtests
